subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: No N.F.L. team has called Los Angeles home since 1995, but the Chargers, the Raiders and the Rams have all unveiled plans to build stadiums near the city.
snippet: No N.F.L. team has called Los Angeles home since 1995, but the Chargers, the Raiders and the Rams have all unveiled plans to build stadiums near the city.
